name: Pocket Hotel kickstarter Demo
description:
Support me on kickstarter:)

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chinobermea/pocket-hotel

This game is a demo only so it might have bugs and the designs are not final, i hope you enjoy it!

Pocket Hotel its a mobile building game inspired on an old Facebook game, believing that there is nothing similar nowadays, implementing the old and new mechanics
